1021.html:
Updates to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

Hello,

We’re emailing you to let you know we’ve updated our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

Over the last two years, Slack has evolved from a messaging tool to a digital workplace, connecting teams with the people and tools they work with every day.

On November 17, we updated our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to reflect how people are now using Slack. You can continue reading more details below or check out more information in our Help Center.

We recommend you review the updated Privacy Policy and Terms of Service, which have now been broken out into the Customer Terms of Service and the User Terms of Service. Specifically, if you are the organization or individual that created or now owns a team, the updates in the Customer Terms of Service apply to you. If you joined an existing team by invitation, the updated User Terms of Service apply to you.

The updated agreements are effective November 17, 2016 and by using Slack on or after that date, you consent to the updates. If you don't want to be bound by these agreements, you may follow the instructions in the Help Center to deactivate your Slack account.

The key updates are:

  • Providing more clarity to our customers and users by:
    • Identifying the terms in our Terms of Service that apply to customers and the controls they have over their data, and the terms and controls that are available to users.
    • Making the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy easier to understand and clarifying Slack’s relationship with its customers and users.
    • Helping businesses in an array of verticals and geographies comply with their internal policies.
  • Providing EU-US Privacy Shield Information: We've added language about our participation in the EU-U.S. Privacy Shield Framework to make it more clear how we're protecting the data of customers using Slack in the EU.

If you need help or have any questions, please visit our Help Center.

Thank you,
The team at Slack

  Made by Slack Technologies, Inc
155 5th Street, 6th Floor   San Francisco, CA 94103 		 
  Our Blog  •  Policies

1026.html:
[Post a Project] Saravana Kumar, Get started now and hire an expert freelancer in just a few minutes → Get FREE Quotes →


Hi Saravana Kumar, how's your side project going?

It's a great business idea, but you have so much to get done! Wouldn't it be great if you could get an extra set of hands for a few hours every week to help you get everything launched. Sure, you could do it yourself, but is that really the best use of your time? Especially when you have such access to millions of expert freelancers around the world.

Hiring a Freelancer is simple, quick and more affordable than you'd expect. Just answer a few questions and choose a price range, and within minutes you will have expert freelancers from around the world bidding on your project.

You can get almost anything done on freelancer, here are just a few ideas:
Website Development
Mobile App Developer
Photographer

1027.html:
View this email in your browser
NewLeaf Labs is now venntov!
I hope you are having an awesome today.  First, thank you for being a loyal customer, I appreciate your business.  Second, I wanted to let you know that today my company, NewLeaf Labs, changed its name to venntov.  This is strictly a name change, and the leadership, support team, and app development will remain the same.

We are continuing to grow and develop our products to better serve our users, and have even more exciting things coming your way in the beginning of 2017.
If you have any questions, just respond to this email.
Thank you,
--Josh Highland
CEO, venntov

1034.html:
Find more international customers today.
 
 
Meet Twitter Ads
Start a campaign
Hi @sarkware
With Twitter Ads, you can now advertise to over 200 global markets.* Follow these steps to set up a campaign:
 
Choose your objective
 
Select a campaign based on your desired outcome: website clicks or conversions, app installs or re-engagements, followers, or Tweet engagements.
 
 
Target your audience
 
Use our robust targeting options to focus on specific geographic markets, interests, demographics, device types, behaviours, and more.
 
 
Set your budget
 
Decide how much you want to spend — you’ll only pay for the results that align with your campaign objective. For example, in a website clicks or conversions campaign, you’ll only pay for clicks that send a user to your website from your Tweet.
 
Get started
business.twitter.com |  @TwitterBusiness |  Support

Twitter, Inc. 1355 Market Street, Suite 900, San Francisco, CA 94103
Unsubscribe

With the ongoing shortage of liquidity, compensate for your local sales by selling on eBay.
Click Here To Know More
Selling online is now more secure
PayPal's Seller Protection Policy covers all eligible transactions to protect online businesses from fraud.
Know More
Global freelancing made easy
Receive international payments quicker with PayPal.Me, by Just sharing your personalized link!
Click here to grab your link!
Account Help Fees Security Shop
To ensure that you are able to receive our emails, please add @mail.paypal.com to your safe senders list. For more information, please click here.
How do I know this is not a spoof email?
Spoof or "phishing" emails tend to have generic greetings such as "Dear PayPal member". Emails from PayPal will always address you by your given surname and given name.
More on phishing
This email was sent to sark@sarkware.com, because your email preferences are set to receive the PayPal Periodical newsletter and Product Updates. To unsubscribe, please click here.
Please do not reply to this email. Unfortunately, we are unable to respond to inquiries sent to this address. For immediate answers to your questions, simply visit our Help Center by clicking "Help" at the bottom of any PayPal page.
Consumer advisory — PayPal Pte. Ltd. the holder of PayPal's stored value facility does not require the approval of the Monetary Authority of Singapore. Users are advised to read the terms and conditions carefully.

1048.html:
I am a single mother trying to get a passport for my son. Ask Sushma Swaraj to simplify rules so that single parents can get passports easily for their children.

Sign my petition
 

Dear Saravana,

I escaped from my abusive husband when I was pregnant. I am a single mother and I have a wonderful 10-year-old son. 

For the past 3 years I have been fighting to get my son a passport. The passport office says I need my ex-husband’s permission. 

But my ex-husband has remarried and he is never coming back. 

If I am capable of raising my son on my own, then why can’t the government issue his passport with just my name on it.

Saravana, help me get my son a passport. Sign my petition and ask the Minister of External Affairs, Sushma Swaraj to simplify the rules for single parents.

The Delhi High Court has said that a mother’s name is sufficient to issue a passport. However passport offices don’t follow this rule. 

My son needs your help and so do all the single mothers in this country who are fighting all odds to raise their children. Sign this petition and join us in this fight.

Thank you for your support,

Juveria Patni
Sign my petition

Want to change something?
Start a petition.

This email was sent by Change.org to sark@sarkware.com. You can edit your email preferences or unsubscribe from these emails.

Start a petition   ·   Contact us   ·   Privacy policy
Change.org   ·   548 Market St #29993, San Francisco, CA 94104-5401, USA

Office 365 Personal
Price change, effective January 11, 2017
Microsoft periodically assesses its pricing to ensure reasonable alignment with the needs of customers, partners, and the marketplace, and may make changes in response to that assessment and feedback.

Effective January 11, 2017, the annual price of Office 365 Personal purchased directly from Microsoft in India will change from ₹3,299.00 to ₹3,629.00.

Your subscription will reflect the new price beginning with your next payment after January 11.

If you have questions, please contact Microsoft customer services.
 
Microsoft respects your privacy. Please read our online Privacy Statement.

1058.html:
Hi there—Michael here, co-founder and CEO of Nylas. 

I've got some great news to share. The Nylas N1 Salesforce integration is now available for everyone! Even more importantly, this integration is free and currently available for all N1 users. All you have to do is connect to your Salesforce Enterprise environment to get started! 

    Tweet the news!
     

    Connect Salesforce and N1 for faster, more complete data entry and sync

    When you flip back and forth between your inbox and Salesforce, you waste time you could be using to build relationships and close deals. That’s why we built the Salesforce plugin for Nylas N1: to help sales executives, marketers, and managers avoid context switching between email and Salesforce.com. The Salesforce plugin is designed to streamline the activities you do every day, without leaving your inbox.

    Learn about all the features of this powerful integration in this blog post.

     

    Learn about how we're leveraging Electron

    In our latest post on the Nylas engineering blog, our team discusses how Electron is helping us decrease the download size for N1, improve performance, provide broader language support, and simplify maintenance.

    We’re excited to be part of the Electron community! If Electron has helped your team too, we’d love to talk to you and learn more. 

    Happy emailing,

    Michael (@grinich)
    CEO and Co-Founder, Nylas

     
     
    You're receiving this email because you expressed interest in Nylas!
    Preferences  |  Unsubscribe
